cast.name: 帕维尔·切纳廖夫 Pavel Chinaryov
亚历山大·昆泽内斯特罗夫 Alexander Kuznetsov
亚历山大·沃罗比约夫 Aleksandr Vorobyov
亚历山德拉·博格丹诺娃 Aleksandra Bogdanova

introduction: Andrey is a safety expert who enjoys his freedom and single life. He has a happy future ahead of him, or so he believes. But his peaceful and untroubled life comes to an end once and for all when he's charged with robbing a major bank. And he could easily have done it. After all, he worked on the bank's safety system. The investigation is short and finds against Andrey. He ends up behind bars. Andrey has to find the real robbers to prove his innocence. But he can't do it from prison-he needs to get out. So the former safety expert turns his skills to escaping. He can't do it alone and has to take a true criminal with him.
